traits.Keen Smell: The catoblepas has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
traits.Stench: Any creature other than a catoblepas that starts its turn within 10 feet of the catoblepas must succeed on a DC 16+1d6 + 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any catoblepas for 1 hour.

actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16+1d6 + 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the start of the catoblepas's next turn.
actions.Death Ray (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The catoblepas targets a creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 16+1d6 + 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target instead takes 64 necrotic damage. The target dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this ray.
